title.rendered: India meets England in the Semi-final of the T20 World cup

content.rendered:
England captain Joss Butler praised the leadership of India captain Rohit Sharma. Rohit Sharma

leads the Indian team, while Jos Butler leads the England T20 team to the semi-final. The match will be played on the 10th of November 2022.

Rohit asked the team to be aggressive and play more freely. England captain Jos Butler has praised Indian skipper Rohit Sharma ahead of the T20 World Cup semi-finals, saying he is an excellent captain and always keeps calm around him. Butler also recalled his experience with Rohit Sharma during his early days as a Mumbai Indians player in the Indian Premier League (IPL).

Having established himself as one of the best foreign players in the IPL, Butler began his career with Mumbai’s Indians in 2016. In 2016 and his 2017 season, the wicketkeeper got the chance to open for his MI side, which he managed by Rohit. However, his breakthrough in the tournament season came in 2018 with the Rajasthan Royalshttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rajasthan_Royals. Butler, who played under Rohit in the IPL in 2016 and 2017, said the current India captain was a bit young at the time but tactically adept. I think Sharma is a great captain and asks to play more aggressively and play more freely I was a little young in my IPL journey but tactically he was very good and good decisions But it wasn’t always the obvious decision,” Butler told The Sunday Times. When he has this sense of calmness.

Four teams from India, New Zealand, England, and Pakistan advanced through a thrilling Super 12 stage to reach the semi-finals. India will play England will play their semi-final second leg in Adelaide on November 10, while Pakistan and New Zealand will play their semi-final first leg in Sydney on November 9.

Read Also: Babar Azam shares thoughts with the team
